data.name: VR Great Rome City
data.detailed_description:
This is a VR leisure travel game for visiting ancient Rome. Players can visit the ancient Roman arena and other scenes. In each scene, they can find some interesting things and can interact. Players can not only appreciate the exquisite architectural art of ancient Rome during the tour, but also can shuttle through the buildings and find the place where the sword is hidden, which is full of interactive fun.

Instructions:
The trigger button on the right handle is used for transmission, the touchpad moves up and down and the angle of view is turned, and the grip button is grasped;
The menu button on the left handle calls out the menu, the trigger button is confirmed, the touchpad moves back and forth, left and right, and the grip button is grasped;

data.short_description: This is a VR leisure travel game for visiting ancient Rome. Players can visit the ancient Roman arena and other scenes.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
